entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 11:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
